definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
book or record/registry/roll/place of one's family or ancestral records/membership

sentences.english: The participants of the VIP card membership must fill in the following information. (If applicant requires a VIP card, please also fill in the below section).
sentences.chinese: 專匯醫療貴賓卡會籍參加者必須填妥以下資料。

sentences.english: Which Lane Crawford's membership have you joined?
sentences.chinese: 以下那個連卡弗的會籍你有參與？

sentences.english: All members shall pay in time their membership fee so as to retain their membership.
sentences.chinese: 所有會員必須每年準時繳交指定之會費以確保其會籍。

sentences.english: You never know who might know the person who is looking for the person who could be you in your next job.
sentences.chinese: 也許會籍此認識正在尋找員工的僱主也說不準。

sentences.english: Photocopies of certificates etc. confirming qualifications, membership, etc.
sentences.chinese: 證書影印本，證明資格及會籍等。

sentences.english: Want a membership of AE&M Club?
sentences.chinese: 想要申請幻雅俱樂部會籍？

sentences.english: Membership cannot be transferred to any person except approved by the club management.
sentences.chinese: 會籍未經俱樂部認可不能轉讓予他人。

sentences.english: If the application is accepted, the Membership Committee will inform the applicant through mail.
sentences.chinese: 如申請成功批覈，會籍委員會將發信通知閣下。

sentences.english: There is an independent Appeal Board set up by the Council to handle appeals related to membership.
sentences.chinese: 社聯設有獨立上訴委員會，處理有關會籍上訴事宜。

definition: Dounan or Tounan town in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
to repay a debt in full/to redeem/to clear
Huwei town in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
an accounts office (in former times)/an accountant/a cashier
term of office/while holding a post
(Tw) medical checkup/physical examination (abbr. for 健康檢查|健康检查[jian4 kang1 jian3 cha2])
